title: The Heroic Week of Victor Phillips
summary: Victor Phillips discovers his supernatural ability to absorb and cure psychological distress, using it to save his city from an emotional epidemic.
summaryGerman: Victor Phillips entdeckt seine übernatürliche Fähigkeit, psychischen Stress zu absorbieren und zu heilen, und verwendet sie, um seine Stadt vor einer emotionalen Epidemie zu retten.
summaryDutch: Victor Phillips ontdekt zijn bovennatuurlijke vermogen om psychologische stress te absorberen en te genezen, en gebruikt het om zijn stad te redden van een emotionele epidemie.
summaryFrench: Victor Phillips découvre sa capacité surnaturelle à absorber et guérir le stress psychologique, qu'il utilise pour sauver sa ville d'une épidémie émotionnelle.

story.text: Victor's day began as usual at the library. While reading psychology texts, he felt a strange sensation and unknowingly absorbed the anxiety of a nearby reader, leaving them suddenly peaceful.
Encouraged by yesterday's odd but positive event, Victor experimented with his power at a counseling session. Each client left happier than ever, confirming his new abilities.
An increased number of emotional crises swept through the city. Victor, realizing the potential of his powers, visited hospitals to calm stressed staff and patients.
The local news aired a story about an 'Emotional Healer' among them. Victor, although cautious, felt a deep sense of purpose in helping his community privately.
Victor spent the day researching his condition, discovering historical references to others like him. He understood he wasn't alone and that he had a greater role to play.
With his identity still hidden, Victor organized a city-wide mental wellness seminar, using it as a cover to spread his healing wider.
Reflecting on the week, Victor felt peaceful. He realized that his powers gave him a unique position to not only understand but also physically remove pain from the world.

ending: In a world where pain often seems indomitable, the quiet work of heroes like Victor Phillips reminds us that healing is not just an art, but a superpower.
moral: The greatest of powers are those that foster connection and healing.
